thread.title: KENT KINARD
thread.title_full: DIY Direct Supply reviewed by KENT KINARD

author: KENT KINARD
title: KENT KINARD
text: Price was good. Supposedly item was in stock but had to contact them 2 days after I ordered and it hadn't shipped yet. They apologized and would send it out and give me tracking info. Two days later had to contact again. It was shipped but failed to send me shipping info
